title: Football Live: Live NFL scores, stats and news.
description:
With over 10 million downloads across the Sportsmate LIVE apps you know you’re in good hands.
The Pro Football Live app by Sportsmate is the only way to stay up to date on everything NFL. After a recent debut in 2016, Pro Football Live continues to innovate while still putting the fans first, bringing you everything that you need to be the most in-the-know NFL fan possible.
Built by NFL fans, for NFL fans, combining up-to-the-second live scores and stats from every match with the most in-depth statistical database, as well as exclusive analysis and the latest breaking news and video highlights.
Whether it’s key match up between division rivals, a make or break game for sub .500 franchise or the Super Bowl,  we’ve got you covered. Don’t just follow your team, join them!
FOLLOW LIVE
Access live coverage of every NFL match, including the playoffs and the Superbowl.
Live scores for each match
Play-by-play match commentary
Detailed match stats, player stats and team lists
Player specific stat sheets
TRACK YOUR FAVOURITE TEAM AND PLAYERS
Follow the progress of your club and your favourite players throughout the NFL season.
Follow every thing to do with your club in the dedicated Team News tab
Watch all your team’s highlights after their match
Stay up to date with the latest club news and team tweets
Keep an eye on your favourite players and their injury status
GET THE STATS
Been thrown a thorny NFL question? Need the perfect football trivia answer? Don’t worry we have you covered here too with a detailed database of team and individual player stats.
Up to date club and player stat rankings
Leaderboards for individual stats and KPIs
Individual player profiles and career stats
Compare players head to head
STAY UP TO DATE
NFL Live by Sportsmate also brings you the breaking football news from America’s #1 sport
A thorough overview of the day’s play from around the country via the Match Day tab
Access news and updates about club teams
Watch and listen to videos and podcast series on demand
Personalise alerts so you never miss any of the action, touchdowns or latest news
DOWNLOAD NOW
NFL Live by Sportsmate is available FREE for all NFL enthusiasts around the world. Don’t miss a minute, download now and start tracking live football scores today!
NEW FEATURES COMING SOON
We’re constantly releasing updates and improving our apps so we’d love to hear from you how we could make the NFL Live app even better. Please send all feedback to support@sportsmatemobile.com, tweet us at @Sportsmate or use the feedback form inside your app’s Settings.
ABOUT THE DEVELOPERS
Founded in 2009 and based in Melbourne, Australia, Sportsmate Mobile is an Independent Sports Media company which creates and distributes mobile applications focused on delivering lightning fast sport scores and stats to sports fans all over the world.
With over 10 million global downloads, we are Australia's number one sports app network. Our growing suite of apps is built by a dedicated team of sports mad app developers, designers and content creators who are passionate about delivering content sports fans crave.

Founded in 2009 and based in Melbourne, Australia, Sportsmate Mobile is an Independent Sports Media company which creates and distributes mobile applications focused on delivering lightning fast sport scores and stats to sports fans all over the world.

With over 10 million global downloads, we are Australia's number one sports app network. Our growing suite of apps is built by a dedicated team of sports mad app developers, designers and content creators who are passionate about delivering content sports fans crave.
